A Coverdale Legacy, Reimagined

Discover historic charm infused with modern luxury in the heart of the Yorkshire Dales.

Explore Your Escape

A Timeless Retreat

The Foresters Arms is a Grade II listed property, located in the picturesque village of Carlton-in-Coverdale in the North Yorkshire Dales. Nestled under the peaks of Roova Crags and Penhill, Carlton is only six miles from Leyburn and is set within The Yorkshire Dales National Park.

Named after the Foresters Friendly Society, this 250-year-old inn is a welcome rest for the weary traveler. It is convenient for many local attractions in the Dales and there are excellent walks in the beautiful countryside around Carlton. We are also on the Yorkshire Dales Cycle Way with several routes that will definitely help keep you fit!

Our Restaurant

Local Flavours

Indulge in hearty, home-cooked meals prepared with locally sourced ingredients, reflecting the best of Yorkshire culinary traditions. (Check food serving times below).

Legendary Ales

We proudly serve a wide range of beers, lagers and ales on keg; a rare treat and a taste of true Yorkshire heritage.

Dales Adventures

Located on the Yorkshire Dales Cycle Way and surrounded by breathtaking walks, we are the perfect base for explorers. The Tour de Yorkshire often passes our door!

Opening Hours

Bar Timings:

  • Mon to Thu: 5pm to Late

Food Service:

  • Monday: No food service
